ygData.subject: Re: Doh! They forget us !!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Cast Force is a radius Spell that does 90 Damage to everything within Reach of your staff. the Mana cost is 123..mind you these numbers are at level 24! ~
ygData.messageBody:
Cast Force is a radius Spell that does 90 Damage to everything within Reach
of your staff. the Mana cost is 123..mind you these numbers are at level 24!

~ Auraelle Dracul ~
~Priestess of Veeshan~
~ Follower of Tunare ~
~ Lords of Light ~


----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Smith <jj@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 12:37 PM
Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Doh! They forget us !!!


> From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>
>
> Cast Force? Has anyone made this yet? If so, what are the damage/mana
usage?
> Thanks,
> Zebbi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ziffnab MageStorm [mailto:eq_ziffnab@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 7:06 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Doh! They forget us !!!
>
>
> From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
>
> I understand your pain. Do not be so pesamistic (spelling wrong im
> sure). Enstill works well enough because when it holds....it hold for
> a DAMN long time. Do you remember way back when you first got root.
> It did not work for a damn. Now it works nicely on most white and blue
> critters....some yellow and red as well. Give Estill another level to
> work better. It does get better. I agree the DD spell at level 24 was
> rotten...although a bit better in way of mana consumption. I am going
> to make the Cast Force spell and Column of Lightning to try them out.
>
> - Ziffnab
>
> --- RIVIERE STEPHANE <Stephane.Riviere@...> wrote:
> > From: RIVIERE STEPHANE <Stephane.Riviere@...>
> >
> > Hi all guys,
> > it seems that OR we are all on hollidays OR we know
> > all about wizzard :). I
> > don t receive more then 1 list all 2 days now :(
> > Come an guys, we need to wake up ! :)
> > On another point, i just read the new patch
> > message.. Damn.... From the
> > begining, nothing as been change for the wizzards...
> > They just change during
> > the patch , the casting time . I have tested BEFORE
> > and after : no change
> > (that a clock can see, so it s surely a change of
> > let s say 0,001 second or
> > something like that.In other words : nothing.
> > All patch just power up the race... Now the druid
> > dot spel are fast like
> > hell, necro same. And us ?? From the beginning, we
> > have major bug who are
> > not resolved and they do nothing for us...
> > Force shock is bugged cause he is resisted too much
> > (and i am ok that he get
> > resisted so much IF he stun like he must do). The
> > enstill spel doesn't work
> > (i have tested with root : root is 10 times more
> > effective). I am a playing
> > a shaman and i think i will stop my wizzard... We
> > have nothing funny : we
> > just level and wait for what ? Our dd spel nothing
> > more, no buf, no pet, no
> > life tap, no shield,no dot, no sow, nothing cool
> > except some gate spel...
> > That s so boring.. For solo from level 8 to 50 you
> > root nuke nuke root nuke
> > nuke dead... Wow that s pretty funny :( :( :(.
> > What about our ae spel ? and pe spel ?? Did someone
> > here use them ????
> > NOBODY...
> >
> > So guys, we were talking some weeks ago to
> > petition.. Nothing has be done or
> > you just don t send the letter ???
> >
> > See you on karana
> > yakos level 25 wizzard AND dabou level 13 shaman
> > (playtime for wizzard : 20 days, for shaman , 2
> > days....)
> >
